name: fast-music-remover
description: fast-music-remover is a command-line tool that detects and removes background music from audio using machine learning models. It is geared towards podcasters, editors, and creators who need quick vocal isolation.
features: Audio Processing: Remove background music from audio, Vocal isolation using ML, Fast processing. Clean audio extraction.
Content Creation: Perfect for podcasters and editors. Professional results.
Command-Line Tool: Batch processing support. Automation-ready.
Machine Learning: AI-powered separation. High-quality output.
Multiple Formats: Support various audio files. Universal compatibility.
Vocal Isolation: Extract clean speech. Remove music tracks.
Fast Performance: Quick processing times. Efficient workflow.
